DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study and demonstrate the reliability of EOS imaging system in the measurement of internal diameters of obstetrical pelvis versus "Goldstandard current "that is the pelviscanner.
DOC.brief_title: Performance Evaluation of System EOS Imaging in Pelvimetry Versus Pelvi-scanner
DOC.criteria: pelviscanner indication in women In the disqualification of another study or under the "national register of volunteers."
